title: Evaluate Topic Allocation Learner
description:
We need a learner to classify the topics associated with a given domain.

Goals:

* Prompt LLM using generated topic definitions to classify correct topics
* Experiment with different prompting techniques

Evaluation:

* Use Wikidata labels as ground truth
* General EDA of outputs:
  * Is the classification as expected? Do we get a lot of no confidence predictions? Do we get a skew/bias towards certain topics?
* Q: Is there a manually labelled dataset available?
